project_title: VPC with Public and Private Subnets
author: Syeda Umaima Abeer
description: Created a custom VPC in AWS with both public and private subnets, configured for secure internet access and isolation. The project involved attaching an internet gateway, setting up route tables, and configuring a NAT gateway for secure outbound access from private instances.
steps_performed: Created a custom VPC with CIDR block 10.0.0.0/16
Added public and private subnets with appropriate CIDR blocks
Created and attached an Internet Gateway to the VPC
Created and associated route tables for public and private subnets
Created a NAT Gateway with Elastic IP in the public subnet
Configured the private route table to use the NAT Gateway for internet access
